info.title: Mini CS50x Answer API
info.description: API for submitting answers and retrieving rankings for the ISPH Mini CS50x competition.

post.summary: Add a hint for a team and question
post.description: Stores a hint submission with a timestamp in the database.

team_name_id.description: The name of the team submitting the hint

get.description: Retrieves a list of all questions without their answers.

star_rating.description: The star rating of the question.

get.description: Retrieves the current rankings of teams based on their scores and solve times.

solves.description: An array containing solve status and timestamps.

latestSolve.description: The timestamp of the team's latest solve (GMT+7).

get.description: Retrieves the solve status and timestamps of a specific team.

timestamps.description: An array containing timestamps of solves.

get.summary: Retrieve team statistics including solves, score, and hints given.
get.description: Fetches the team's progress, calculates their score based on the star ratings of solved questions, and returns relevant statistics.

parameters.name: team_name_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the team.

items.description: An array containing solved question IDs and timestamps.

score.description: The total score based on solved questions and their star ratings.

hints_given.description: The number of hints given to the team.

500.description: Internal Server Error or database fetch error.

error.example: Failed to fetch team stats from database

post.description: Submits an answer for a specific question by a team.

team_name_id.description: The ID of the team submitting the answer.

question_id.description: The ID of the question being answered.

answer.description: The answer submitted by the team.

correct.description: Indicates whether the submitted answer is correct.
